title: Preview Earlier Messages in chat
body:
Hi,
I really need your help, I dont know if it works to check up earlier messages but I really need your help to check out earlier messages since my friend and another friend are fighting (not talking to each other anymore) because of a message. So Riot, I'm asking you nicely if you could check up an message for me? This is really imporntant!

Best Regards,
Your lovely customer

replies.body:
Have you closed your client since then? I know some people like to put their computer into hibernate instead of shutdown for the night. If you see your friend online again, then just double-clicking their name will bring up the chat window again. As mentioned earlier, if you still hadn't closed the client since that conversation, it will still be there in the history.

Best of luck.

Riot would only breach a players privacy and retrieve a message if forced to by law. 
Other wise they technically breach their privacy policy and they really don't like doing that.

I would suggest it will be a no, but feel free to keep asking.  :)

I don't think it would be breaching privacy, because **Biffovic** would of had access to that player's personal messaged directed towards him available to him anyway. Maybe if Riot implemented the ability to recall a chat after you've left it (which is still really silly as to how it hasn't been implemented yet, almost all other bare-bones chat based services provide this (eg. Steam, Facebook messager, Skype text chat, etc.)).

But alas, they probably didn't even record it.
